meanings.definition: Provisionals: relating to or concerned with provision
meanings.sent1: The team made provisionals changes to the schedule.
meanings.sent2: She used provisionals materials to fix the broken chair.
meanings.sent3: The provisionals decorations made the room look festive.
meanings.sent4: His provisionals approach to problem-solving was effective.
meanings.sent5: The provisionals solutions were implemented quickly.

meanings.sent1: We set up provisionals housing for the displaced families.
meanings.sent2: The provisionals office space was set up while renovations took place.
meanings.sent3: The provisionals seating arrangement confused the guests.
meanings.sent4: The provisionals solution was a band-aid for the larger issue.
meanings.sent5: She relied on provisionals transportation during the strike.

meanings.definition: Provisionals: a person or thing that provides or supplies provisions
meanings.sent1: The provisionals brought food to the campsite.
meanings.sent2: The provisionals ensured everyone had enough supplies for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The provisionals at the event were friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent4: The provisionals stocked the shelves with fresh produce.
meanings.sent5: The provisionals delivered water to the drought-affected area.
